description: HTML file for a web-based database viewer interface that allows browsing connected databases, tables, and viewing table data with dynamic loading and expandable cells.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, showing a loading indicator and resetting current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database to show its tables, and loads tables on expansion.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs and inserts HTML table to display data, with column headers and rows.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual table cell content, handling nulls, objects, and long strings with expansion.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Handles expanding or collapsing cell content to show full data.
